Municipal.definition: of or relating to the internal affairs of a major political unit
Municipal.origin: [was sentenced by a court of , not international, jurisdiction]

1.definition: of or relating to the internal affairs of a major political unit (as a nation) [was sentenced by a court of , not international, jurisdiction] compare

2 a.definition: of, relating to, or characteristic of a municipality [the counsel]

3.definition: restricted to one localityna security issued by a state or local government or by an authority set up by such a government usually used in pl. see alsoat
